definitions.definition: An event in alpine skiing which combines runs on a downhill skiing course and a slalom course, for individual skiers.
To bring (two or more things or activities) together; to unite.
definitions.example: Combine the milk and the hot water in a large bowl.   I'm combining business and pleasure on this trip.

definitions.definition: To have two or more things or properties that function together.
definitions.example: Joe combines the intelligence of a rock with the honesty of a politician.

definitions.definition: In the game of casino, to play a card which will take two or more cards whose aggregate number of pips equals those of the card played.
To bind; to hold by a moral tie.
Resulting from the addition of several sources, parts, elements, aspects, etc. able to be united together, to converge.
definitions.example: The combined efforts of the emergency workers kept the river from going over its banks, barely.

definitions.definition: An event which combines runs on a cross-country skiing course and a ski jumping hill, for individual skiers.
